members.name: Akash Sharma
members.title: Founder & Principal Designer
members.bio: With over 15 years of experience, Akash leads our team with his innovative vision and passion for transformative design. He founded Sharma Space with the mission to create spaces that truly reflect the personality and lifestyle of each client.
members.longBio: Akash Sharma is the visionary founder of Sharma Space, bringing over 15 years of expertise in interior design to every project. His journey began with a passion for creating spaces that tell stories and enhance lives. Under his leadership, Sharma Space has completed over 150 projects across India, earning recognition for innovative design solutions and client satisfaction. Akash specializes in residential design, sustainable practices, and space optimization for urban living.

image.alt: Akash Sharma founder principal designer Sharma Space Bangalore

education: Bachelor of Architecture - RV College of Architecture, Bangalore
Master of Interior Design - CEPT University, Ahmedabad

members.name: Priya Malhotra
members.title: Senior Interior Designer
members.bio: Priya specializes in residential design with an eye for detail and a talent for creating harmonious living spaces. Her expertise in color psychology and space planning makes her invaluable to our residential projects.
members.longBio: Priya Malhotra brings 8 years of dedicated experience in residential interior design to Sharma Space. Her keen eye for detail and deep understanding of color psychology enables her to create spaces that are not only beautiful but also emotionally resonant. Priya has successfully completed over 40 residential projects, ranging from compact apartments to luxury villas, always focusing on creating harmonious environments that reflect her clients' personalities.

image.alt: Priya Malhotra senior interior designer Sharma Space Bangalore

education: Bachelor of Interior Design - JJ School of Art, Mumbai
Diploma in Color Psychology - National Institute of Design
achievements: Featured in Better Homes & Gardens India

seo.focusKeyword: residential interior designer bangalore priya malhotra

members.name: Vikram Mehta
members.title: Commercial Design Specialist
members.bio: Vikram brings his expertise in commercial and hospitality design, creating functional and impressive spaces for businesses. His understanding of brand integration and workspace psychology sets him apart.
members.longBio: Vikram Mehta is our lead commercial design specialist with over 10 years of experience in creating impactful business environments. His expertise spans office design, retail spaces, restaurants, and hospitality venues. Vikram's unique approach combines functionality with brand storytelling, ensuring that every commercial space not only serves its purpose but also communicates the client's brand values effectively.

image.alt: Vikram Mehta commercial design specialist Sharma Space Bangalore

education: Master of Commercial Design - CEPT University

seo.focusKeyword: commercial interior designer bangalore vikram mehta
